title: Dell security advisory (AV25-680)
description: Between October 13 and 19, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Dell AMD-based PowerEdge Server  multiple versions and models
Dell AX System for Azure  versions prior to 2509
Dell Connectrix MDS  versions prior to 9.4 (3a)
Dell Integrated System for Microsoft Azure Stack Hub 16G and 14G  versions prior to 2508
Dell Networking OS10  versions prior to 10.6.0.6
Dell PowerEdge T40  versions prior to 1.21.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
